Issue.creator: avkrishnan
Issue.summary: Enhance test pipelines to run tests on Windows 10
Issue.description: We need to run sovrin-client tests in GoCD for Windows 10* Prepare a VM for Windows 10* Install GoCD agent to the Windows machines* Connect Windows GoCD agents to the GoCD server* Enhance test pipelines for ledger(-dev), anoncreds(-dev), plenum(-dev), sovrin-client(-dev), sovrin-common(-dev) to run tests on Windows 10 (in parallel with ubuntu)* Check that it starts all integration tests and reports results.Please refer to the following design doc: Sovrin Pipeline Design|https://docs.google.com/document/d/1hKwXzX3vsKN97R9F3XVzpCZ7WBOYkyCLuOyrvhCH048/edit#
